name: AudioClassifier
description: Identify the most prominent type in the audio clip from a known set of categories.

input_tensor_metadata.name: audio_clip
input_tensor_metadata.description: Input audio clip to be classified.

associated_files.name: yamnet_521_labels.txt
associated_files.description: Labels for categories that the model can recognize.

associated_files.name: score_calibration.txt
associated_files.description: Contains sigmoid-based score calibration parameters. The main purposes of score calibration is to make scores across classes comparable, so that a common threshold can be used for all output classes.
